about_the_game:
This software is a collection of characters from 25 different fantasy monsters drawn in a cartoon style. Each monster is drawn in several variants adapted for different development modes of your project using the RPG Maker MV or MZ engine (characters, faces, enemies, sv_enemies). The graphics of the collection are suitable for the combat system, both from the first and third person.

Contents
・characters 25 sheets (6 large size, 21 regular size)
・faces 25 sheets
・enemies 25 sheets
・sv_actors 25 sheets (without animation of death)
・sv_enemies 25 sheets (+ bonus: 350 sheets alternative monsters poses)

----------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
